annotation.spannedText: There is no cure for rabies but there is a vaccine to prevent it

classMention.mentionClass: There is no cure for rabies but there is a vaccine to prevent it

annotation.spannedText: Fortunately there is a vaccine to prevent it which is very effective

classMention.mentionClass: Fortunately there is a vaccine to prevent it which is very effective

annotation.spannedText: Even if you have had the rabies vaccine as a precaution, if you are then bitten, you need further doses to make sure you do not develop the disease

classMention.mentionClass: Even if you have had the rabies vaccine as a precaution, if you are then bitten, you need further doses to make sure you do not develop the disease

annotation.spannedText: If you have had the vaccine beforehand, you also have better protection against the rabies virus

classMention.mentionClass: If you have had the vaccine beforehand, you also have better protection against the rabies virus

annotation.spannedText: If you have an illness causing a high temperature (fever) it is best to postpone immunisation until after the illness

classMention.mentionClass: If you have an illness causing a high temperature (fever) it is best to postpone immunisation until after the illness

annotation.spannedText: You should not have a booster if you have had a severe allergic reaction to this vaccine in the past

classMention.mentionClass: You should not have a booster if you have had a severe allergic reaction to this vaccine in the past

annotation.spannedText: You should not have a rabies vaccination if you have had a severe allergic reaction to one of the components in the vaccine in the past

classMention.mentionClass: You should not have a rabies vaccination if you have had a severe allergic reaction to one of the components in the vaccine in the past

annotation.spannedText: you should not have it if you are severely allergic to neomycin

classMention.mentionClass: you should not have it if you are severely allergic to neomycin

annotation.spannedText: You should avoid any contact with wild or domestic animals when travelling abroad

classMention.mentionClass: You should avoid any contact with wild or domestic animals when travelling abroad
